key.name: monitor-type
key.description: The type of system resource to monitor (cpu, memory, swap, load)

key.name: refresh-rate
key.description: How often to update the display in milliseconds

key.name: yellow-threshold
key.description: Percentage at which the indicator turns yellow (moderate use)

key.name: red-threshold
key.description: Percentage at which the indicator turns red (heavy use)

key.name: terminal-command
key.description: Command to launch terminal. Use %c as placeholder for the btop command.

key.name: btop-command
key.description: Command to run btop (useful if btop is not in PATH)

key.name: panel-position
key.description: Position in the panel (left, center, right)

key.name: panel-index
key.description: Index within the panel position (0 = leftmost for that section)
